channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Burned car in the field, 4th July
item.description:
There’s a car that’s been on fire abandoned in the field.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): William Barefoot Drive, Coldharbour, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large fly tip of various things on April Street E8, 4th July
item.description:
Hello, please can you remove the large flytip at April Street, E8 of various items. Thank you

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): April Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Private tree hanging low onto public footpath, 4th July
item.description:
There is a private tree growing in the front garden of 30 Queens Avenue, Whetstone N20 that is massively overhanging onto the public pavement path. You cannot walk underneath the tree now it's so overgrown so you have to duck down, which is really difficult when holding my baby plus if it rains the tree hangs very low that you have to walk in the road to get past. We have tried asking the owner to kindly cut it back but to no avail.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Loring Road, Whetstone, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Garden waste in community bin, 4th July
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Shrubland Road, Hackney, London
